p: Our data showed that ~70% of ICU-ARDS associated with IBV occurred in individuals >64 years old, which was a similar situation to that in Italy as a whole [ 22]. The aTIV was recommended in Italy for the 2017-2018 season for this age group and provided free of charge [ 4]. Because of the impact of IBV in the elderly in the 2017-2018 influenza season, the Italian Ministry of Health has also recommended, for the 2018-2019 season, the use of QIV in individuals aged 65–74 years [ 23]. In Apulia region, for the elderly, the preferential use of QIV was recommended only for individuals in the 65–74-year age group who were at low risk (without multiple comorbidities) [ 24].
